name: part_007
file: tmp_【 #常闇トワ6周年記念LIVE 】ROCK Festa !!!【 3DLIVE 】 [pmWH-wAJYRE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

subtitles.original: ドライフラワーみたいだ
subtitles.english: Like a dry flower

subtitles.original: 時間が経てばきっと きっと きっと きっと
subtitles.english: As time goes by, surely, surely, surely, surely

subtitles.original: 色あせる
subtitles.english: The colors will fade

subtitles.original: 月明かりに魔物が揺れる きっと私もどうかしている
subtitles.english: A monster sways in the moonlight, I must be going crazy too

subtitles.original: 暗闇に色彩が浮かぶ
subtitles.english: Colors float in the darkness

subtitles.original: 赤、黄、青色が胸の奥 ずっとあなたの名前を呼ぶ
subtitles.english: Red, yellow, blue deep in my chest, always calling your name

subtitles.original: 好きという気持ち また薫る
subtitles.english: The feeling of love scents the air again

subtitles.original: 声も 顔も 不器用なとこも
subtitles.english: Your voice, your face, even your clumsiness

subtitles.original: 全部 全部 大嫌いだよ
subtitles.english: I hate them all, all of them

subtitles.original: まだ枯れない花を 君に添えてさ
subtitles.english: Placing a flower that hasn't withered yet by your side

subtitles.original: ずっと ずっと ずっと ずっと
subtitles.english: Forever, forever, forever, forever

subtitles.original: 抱えてよ
subtitles.english: Keep holding onto it

subtitles.original: 二人三脚 feat. 猫汰つな / 作詞：徳田光希 作曲・編曲：三好啓太 / 徳田光希
subtitles.english: Ninin Sankyaku feat. Nekose Tsuna / Lyrics: Mitsuki Tokuda / Composition/Arrangement: Keita Miyoshi / Mitsuki Tokuda

subtitles.original: 「大丈夫」と
subtitles.english: Saying "I'm okay"

subtitles.original: また嘘をついた
subtitles.english: I told another lie

subtitles.original: 無理してるの
subtitles.english: You're overextending yourself

subtitles.original: 声でわかるよ バレてるんだよ
subtitles.english: I can tell by your voice, I've seen through you

subtitles.original: 二人三脚
subtitles.english: Ninin Sankyaku

subtitles.original: ダメなとこも 性格だって違うあなた
subtitles.english: You, with different flaws and personality from me

subtitles.original: だけど似てる どこか痛いとこ合って
subtitles.english: But we're similar, our sore spots align somehow

subtitles.original: 共鳴 すぐにしたんだ
subtitles.english: We resonated instantly

subtitles.original: 共鳴
subtitles.english: Resonance

subtitles.original: 惹かれ合った私たち
subtitles.english: Drawn to each other

subtitles.original: 惹かれ合っ
subtitles.english: Drawn to each other

subtitles.original: 不思議なこの絆
subtitles.english: This mysterious bond

subtitles.original: 不思議なこの絆
subtitles.english: This mysterious bond

subtitles.original: なんだか眠れなくて
subtitles.english: Makes it hard to sleep somehow

subtitles.original: 月夜語り明かそう 明日まで
subtitles.english: Let's talk under the moon until tomorrow

subtitles.original: 私が頑張れる理由 そう 一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: The reason I can keep going is because I'm not alone

subtitles.original: そう 一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: That's right, because I'm not alone

subtitles.original: あなたが笑えば 私もつられる
subtitles.english: When you laugh, I can't help but laugh too

subtitles.original: 隣り合わせの心 連鎖してるよ
subtitles.english: Our hearts side-by-side are in a chain reaction

subtitles.original: 隣り合わせの心 連鎖してるよ
subtitles.english: Our hearts side-by-side are in a chain reaction

subtitles.original: 時には歩幅が ズレてしまうけど
subtitles.english: Sometimes our strides might get out of sync

subtitles.original: 時には歩幅が
subtitles.english: Sometimes our strides

subtitles.original: 二人 呼吸合わせ
subtitles.english: Let's synchronize our breathing

subtitles.original: 二人
subtitles.english: Two people

subtitles.original: 未来へと進んで行こう
subtitles.english: And move toward the future together

subtitles.original: どれくらいの 順位かなんて周りと比べて
subtitles.english: Comparing where we stand in the rankings with those around us

subtitles.original: 果てしない トラック先 追いつけるの？
subtitles.english: Can we catch up on the endless track ahead?

subtitles.original: なんて弱気な日も 激励し続けてくれた
subtitles.english: On those faint-hearted days, you kept encouraging me

subtitles.original: あなたにいつも感謝 転んでも立ち上がる
subtitles.english: I'm always grateful to you; I'll get back up even if I fall

subtitles.original: あなたにいつも感謝
subtitles.english: I'm always grateful to you

subtitles.original: いつだって 夢を叶えたいんだ 必ず
subtitles.english: I always want to make my dreams come true, without fail

subtitles.original: こんなにね 打ち込めるのは そう 仲間がいるから
subtitles.english: The reason I can devote myself so much is because I have a companion

subtitles.original: 仲間がいるから
subtitles.english: Because I have a companion

subtitles.original: あなたの悩みは 私が寄り添う
subtitles.english: I'll stay by your side through your worries

subtitles.original: 私が寄り添う
subtitles.english: I'll stay by your side

subtitles.original: 心が疲れたなら 休憩しよう
subtitles.english: If your heart is tired, let's take a break

subtitles.original: 心が疲れれたなら 休憩しよ
subtitles.english: If your heart is tired, let's take a break

subtitles.original: 遠慮はしないで そんな仲じゃない 二人
subtitles.english: Don't hesitate; we're not that kind of strangers

subtitles.original: 二人
subtitles.english: Two people

subtitles.original: 肩を組んで ほら 何度でも乗り越え
subtitles.english: Putting our arms around each other, see, we can overcome anything time and again

subtitles.original: 肩を組んで ほら 何度でも乗り越え
subtitles.english: Putting our arms around each other, see, we can overcome anything time and again
